message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the product at a price of $1400000. This is a great opportunity considering its value to you.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity. Considering my budget constraints, I would be able to make the purchase at $1200000. Let me know if we can proceed with this price.
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but the value of this product justifies a higher price. I'm willing to lower my previous offer to $1300000. Let me know if this works for you.
